title: RPGGame1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
https://youtu.be/58KTcVS47e4 < Youtube Preview



📖Overview.

The RPG Game SFX Pack is a versatile collection of sound effects tailored for a wide range of projects, including games, movies, animations, and more. This pack offers 105 high-quality audio clips that cover various aspects of RPG gameplay. From immersive environmental sounds to captivating combat effects, intricate polyphonic sounds, and even voiceovers, this pack provides a comprehensive audio experience to enhance your project.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Sound Effects: The pack features a wide variety of sounds, including environmental ambiance, combat effects, polyphonic sounds, inventory interactions, and voiceovers.
  • Rich RPG Elements: Enhance your project with map environments, skill effects, item usage, coins, paper, books, monsters, goblins, dragons, and more.
  • Immersive Atmosphere: Create an immersive gaming experience with detailed environmental sounds and dynamic combat effects.
  • Versatile Usage: Suitable for RPG games, movies, animations, and various multimedia projects.



📂FILES. (TrackList)

  • Ambience 9
  • Battle 18
  • Foley 57
  • Inventory 25
  • Voice 31



⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
